properties.areaDesc: Lincoln, LA; Union, LA; Ouachita, LA
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 10:08AM CST by NWS Shreveport LA
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a

* FLOOD WARNING FOR
the Bayou D'Arbonne At Lake D'Arbonne near Farmerville, Louisiana.
* from late tonight until further notice...or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At 9:45 AM Wednesday The pool stage was 82.4 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood pool stage is 83 feet.
* Forecast...Rise above flood pool stage by early Thursday and continue to
rise to near 83.5 feet by Friday morning.
* Impact...Minor lowland flooding around the lake.  Expect some low
access roads to suffer overflow.  Secure boats, watercraft, and docks
for high water.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive vehicles through flooded waterways.  Use caution when
walking near flooded riverbanks.  Do not try to wade or swim in
flooded rivers and bayous.

For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website
address into your favorite web browser URL bar:
water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv
